Title: Relates to sentences of imprisonment for misdemeanors
Summary: Reduces certain sentences of imprisonment for misdemeanors to three hundred sixty-four days.
LawCode: Amd ยง70.15, Pen L; amd ยง440.10, CP L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law and the criminal procedure law, in relation to reducing certain sentences of imprisonment for misdemeanors to three hundred sixty-four days
